docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: NO parents in their right minds would invite a stranger into their home for three to four hours each day to teach their kids. Yet that's precisely what television, a powerful teaching medium, is doing.'' So says Dr. Victor C. Strasburger, director of adolescent medicine at Bridgeport (Conn.) Hospital and member of the task force on children and television of the American Academy of

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: UNION MAN Local 1199 of the Drug, Hospital and Health Care Employees Union and the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr., the slain civil-rights leader, were particularly close. Dr. King spoke at union-sponsored events and union members participated in demonstrations he led.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Unless New York City dedicates itself to making 1987 the year for a concerted effort to improve the lives of the children of poverty, we will contribute to the creation of a social tinderbox.

headline.main: New York's Poor Children: A Tinderbox

docs.snippet: LEAD: Unless New York City dedicates itself to making 1987 the year for a concerted effort to improve the lives of the children of poverty, we will contribute to the creation of a social tinderbox.

byline.original: By Andrew Stein; Andrew Stein is president of New York City Council
